resources.string: This marvelous colorized image was generated by a project from CPSC 475, Android mobile programming. Please contact Prof. Keith Perkins at keith.perkins@cnu.edu if you have any questions about our department or the classes we offer or technology in general.
Welcome to CNU from the PCSE department!
Camera, Read, and Write permissions are required to use this app.
Camera could not be opened. \nThis occurs when the camera is not available (for example it is already in use) or if the system has denied access (for example when camera access has been disabled).
Permission is not available. Requesting camera permission.
Camera permission was granted. Starting preview.
Permission is not available. Requesting write permission.
Permission is not available. Requesting read permission.
Level of sketchiness and color saturation
Set BW threshold, higher numbers correspond to less detail and whiter image
Set color saturation, higher numbers correspond to more colorful images
